title: Identification of hydrogeological and geoelectrical parameters influencing the productivity of boreholes in the commune of Daloa (Central-Western of Côte d'Ivoire)
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Kouadio Kouamé Jean Olivier, Mangoua Oi Mangoua Jules, Koffi Bérenger, Soro Donissongou Dimitri, Dibi Brou, Kouassi Kouakou Lazare
